channel.title: Making a business out of Trello Power Ups
channel.description:
Hi all
Good day to everyone.
I have a question about building tools for platforms. For example, bots for Slack, CRM for G-suite, integration tools for Salesforce
I'm wondering if anyone successfully manage to make a business out from a Power Up on Trello. Recently, I made a report generator (as a power up on Trell) for myself. I'm thinking of making it a tiny sass product and wondering if anyone had success in making a business out from paltform tools.
Thank you.

item.title: Making a business out of Trello Power Ups
item.dc:creator: dgrigg
item.description:
If you check the Trello blog you can find many power ups that appear to be running as standalone products. No idea as to how successful they are but there is a large enough audience that it’s probably possible with the right offering.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a business out of Trello Power Ups
